{{menutrail|Main menu}} [[File:InfoMenu.png|thumb|The info "menu" in [[Doom]].]]The '''info menu''', also called '''Read this!''' menu in shareware [[Doom]], displays help screens generally followed in shareware or demo versions of the [[IWAD]]s by order information to buy the registered game. Its [[MENUDEF]] name is {{c|ReadThisMenu}} and it can be summoned with the {{c|{{CCMD|O|menu_help}}}} console command (bound to the "F1" key by default).
The content of the info menu is not defined in [[MENUDEF]] directly; instead it is built from the [[GameInfo definition]] with the {{c|infopage}} property, and, in game, from the {{c|f1}} property from the current [[map definition]], if any. [[Category:Menus]]
